tool.name: loc2bkp
tool.displayname: Update Existing Backups of Track Points and Lines

param.name: web_pts
param.displayname: Source Track Points Feature Service Layer

param.name: loc_pts
param.displayname: Backup Track Points Feature Class (to update)
param.dialogReference: Backup points feature class or feature service, where new points will be appended.

param.name: lines
param.dialogReference: Backup track lines feature class or feature service, where new track lines will be appended.

param.name: break
param.dialogReference: Time duration used to define breaks between track lines. If the gap between successive points with the same session_id is greater than this, a new track line will be created.

tool.summary: Compares a track points feature service layer to an existing track points feature class or feature service layer backup. Using a 'date_created' field to find rows not present in the backup, copies the new rows from the feature service source to the backup. It then builds track lines for new the updated points, and appends those lines to the backup track lines layer feature class or feature service layer. Can use 'Create New Backups for Track Points and Lines' to generate the backup layers.

idCitation.resTitle: Update Existing Backups of Track Points and Lines
